game.name: Deep Worm
game.description:
This desert is a more dangerous place than it actually looks. There is a shortage for food, water and high temperatures, but predators are available in a great proportion. It’s very difficult to avoid the danger since it is available everywhere. You will see a group of soldiers who are on their way to cross the territory. Your job in this brand new action game is to assist a giant and dangerous worm that is fighting with its hungriness. This worm has a deep trust on you. Join Deep Worm and get ready to help it to eat as many soldiers as you can, while avoiding their killing!

Remember, soldiers are loaded with advanced weapons and guns. So, it’s important to move fast and destroy their vehicles in this one of the best insect games for kids. Play safe while saving the insect from being hit by the ammunition. Your good performance will surely depend on how many people you have sent to the hell and how many vehicles you have destroyed. Pay attention to details to survive long and destroy all military tanks, jeep and trucks in this new side-scrolling rampage game!

It will be a great fun when you get a chance to create the maximum possible carnage in this Sandworm style game for PC. The army people will try to kill you all the time, so be careful while slithering around in the deep and then popping up to take them out. Read all the useful instructions to make the big score in this exciting endless action game! Our website features many more games that can take you to a world of unlimited thrill and entertainment. Tap controls or use arrow keys to move your character. You can speed up your worm using the spacebar key.
